00085 class NodePrinter: public XMLTool::XPath::MultiExpression::NodeEvaluator {
00086 public:
00087    explicit NodePrinter(const MC2String& other = MC2String() ):
00088       m_info( other ) { }
00089 
00090    void operator() ( const DOMNode* node ) {
00091       cout << m_info << " node \"" << node->getNodeName() << "\""
00092            << "= \"" 
00093            << XMLUtility::getChildTextStr( *node ) 
00094            << "\"" << endl;
00095    }
00096 private:
00097    MC2String m_info;
00098 };
